rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MPH5040, MPH5041} OR  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MPH5030, MPH5031})

description: This unit aims to assist students to extend, integrate and apply their core knowledge and skills across the broad domain of clinical research.This unit will require students to formulate clinical questions (regarding diagnosis, management, harm and prognosis), and develop strategies to search the scientific literature to answer these questions.The unit will provide opportunities for students to conduct critical appraisals of primary studies, clinical practice guidelines, shared decision making tools and systematic reviews and apply the results to clinical research and inform patient care.Criteria for choosing studies, including the importance of 'levels' of evidence, will be addressed along with the importance of clinical judgement, and patients' beliefs and values.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
